plot: One of the Mystery Science Theater 3000 faves. A little boy who has an extensive array of pets he likes to call &"specimens&" finds an alien egg to hatch, somewhat like Horton. The creature manages to use his snout to suck up peanuts and warp time and space with his fingers. Unfortunately, his brother who is found by poachers go on a killing spree.   Written by  Jonah Falcon
title: Los nuevos extraterrestres

lists.title: How to torturar a Nick cuando gane alguna apuesta
